articles.title: Christian Ziegler: Republican chairman in Florida suspended amid rape allegation

articles.title: Pope says Roman Catholic priests can bless same-sex couples

articles.description: Record rainfall driven by a tropical cyclone has caused widespread flooding in Australia's north-east.
articles.title: Watch: Crocodile swimming in Australia floods captured
